The Python SDK allows logging via the standard logging module, or via the LCB_LOGLEVEL environment variable.import logging import sys
import couchbase from couchbase.bucket import Bucket
logging.basicConfig(stream=sys.stderr, level=logging.DEBUG) couchbase.enable_logging()
c = Bucket('couchbase://localhost/default') c.upsert('key', ['value'])
The logging itself is done by the underlying C SDK.
